title: Champ Select Game Freeze

embed.description: Snaggy is an image hosting service that lets you paste images from your clipboard directly online.

body: This happened to me in my last game, but it unfroze in time for me to ban and choose my champion. I have been stuck on this screen when I should have been booted for failing to select a champion by now. My client also has trouble notifying me when a match has been found.

replies.body:
@Porocles
Thank u for the fast reponse! I forgot to mention it, but I posted the same question at the forum EUW - then I saw, that some other guys out there face the same problem so I commented here.
I alrdy tried everything on ur list: repair, reinstall, IP-Helpservice, TCP/IP6, DNS (8.8.8.8), stopped Firewall and Antivirus, even reinstalled Windows, tired Wireless and Cable. Nothing changed. still the same problem. And I also very often (9 out of 10) I cant accept the Readycheck before Championselect. It just suddenly says I declined, although I didnt see anything - respectively the Button to Accept appears for approx. 0,1 seconds.
Any ideas left?

Your connection may have had a hiccup and lost sync with champion select, so you got left behind instead of reaching the game server.  More specifically, your network seems to be having trouble transitioning between services.   You should try out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Same here on EUW. Tried everything (IP-Service, repair, reinstall) - sometimes it works and I can enter the game. More often I "dodge" unintentionally. Did lose a lot of LP/promos alrdy and had approx. 5x30 minute ban for "dodging".
Any ideas?
